Uses of Package
updater.script

Packages that use updater.script
updater.crypto Classes for crypto purpose. 
updater.downloader The patch downloader. 
updater.launcher The launcher. 
updater.patch Create and apply patch. 
updater.script XML script reader and writer. 
updater.util Utilities collection. 
 

Classes in updater.script used by updater.crypto
InvalidFormatException
          Thrown when the format of the XML file is invalid.
 

Classes in updater.script used by updater.downloader
Catalog
          This script includes information for software to decide which patch(es) to download to update itself to latest available version.
Client
          This script contains the information needed for the launcher and downloader.
InvalidFormatException
          Thrown when the format of the XML file is invalid.
Patch
          This script resides in the patch describing the patch, includes how the patch is packed and the operations needed to be taken to apply the patch.
